sentence.Network_en: His eyes is staring his front ignorantly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把眼睛茫然凝视着他的前方.

sentence.Network_en: I conceive that you ignorantly worship; in all things you appear to me too superstitions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为你是在愚昧地崇拜, 我觉得你对各种事情都很迷信.

sentence.Network_en: They lived ignorantly in their own small world.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们无知地生活在自己的小小世界之中.
